page.title: 08Clubs in Inverbervie
page.content: For the younger children there are various clubs such as Playgroup, Sunday School, Brownies, Happy Hour and Cubs. As the children get older there are more clubs for them such as Sunday Morning Club, Scouts, Guides, Red Cross, C.B. Club, A.T.C., Youth Club and Rangers. Enjoyment is also important for adults too. They have clubs such as Freemasons, Slimming Club, Badminton. YWCA, Keep Fit, Woman's Guild, Young Woman's Group, Red Cross, WRI and the Bowling Club which is for men and women. On a Saturday night "Bingo" is held in the Burgh Hall. Tennis courts, bowling green, putting green, paddling pool, swings and roundabouts are all suitably situated by the caravan site.
